title: DataDictionary: Measuring the Rate of Scientific Knowledge Transfer
description: A data dictionary (variable names) for research studies designed to measure the rate of scientific knowledge transfer.

relatedArtifact.citation: DataDictionary: Measuring the Rate of Scientific Knowledge Transfer [CodeSystem]. Contributors: In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 181451. Revised 2023-12-06. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/181451. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/181451.

concept.display: Date of first publication of article
concept.definition: When the article was first published

concept.display: Date of first publication of results
concept.definition: When the research findings resulting from the study were first published

concept.display: Date of first preprint of article
concept.definition: When the article (with research findings) was first publicly available as a preprint

concept.display: Date of first posting of results in trial registry
concept.definition: When the research findings resulting from the study were first posted in a registry
Research findings available in a preprint
Research findings are available in a registry
There is a specification of search sources and inclusion criteria.
The report is created with a primary intention of informing or guiding clinical practice (or informing decision makers who are developing clinical practice guidance).

Citation in an independently published report means that the clinical trial results are incorporated into the Results of the report and not just the Introduction and Discussion (if the report has focused Results).
